snippet.title: Ark Odyssey | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Ark Odyssey is a top-down arcade shooter that lets you command an army of starships to fight against the force of void!

Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2701870/Ark_Odyssey/

You will be able to recruit a wide variety of starship squadrons, each one having a unique design and origin, custom passive, attack pattern, and special abilities! Build your very own fleet of unique squadrons by freely customizing unit composition into each different formation.
Become a tactician on the battlefield, shift between different formations in combat for greater advantage, and focus fire with your squadron at crucial moments to turn the tides of battle!

Edited By: Tarun Sharma
Music Provided By: Tito Lopez

Follow Development On: https://x.com/BinaryStellar
Join The Discord Server: https://discord.gg/2q69VJVtSD 
Wishlist Ark Odyssey Now!: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2701870/Ark_Odyssey/
Tryout the Demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2701870/Ark_Odyssey/
